name: Rebecca
text: On Play: Return up to 1 black character other than "Rebecca" with a cost of 3 to 7 from the trash to your hand. Then, play 1 cost 3 or less black character from your hand to the field rested.

effect.text: Return up to 1 black character other than "Rebecca" with a cost of 3 to 7 from the trash to your hand. Then, play 1 cost 3 or less black character from your hand to the field rested.
